name: LabTestsDuringPregnancy
title: Lab Tests During Pregnancy
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent lab tests conducted during pregnancy (e.g., tests conducted on amniotic fluid).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Laboratory Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with laboratory tests conducted during pregnancy. This is a grouping of LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
